availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Fountain Riddle Collins (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah E. Collins. Father of Arthusa L. Collins, Reubin Samuel Collins, Albert B. Collins, William S. Collins, and James P. Collins. Farmer in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 886.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, Flat Creek, p. 543A.
